dict.acceptation: 妈妈；沉默；菊花；烈性啤酒；

sent.orig: The garden mum better able to handle different growing conditions than the florist mum.
sent.trans: 园艺菊花相对观赏菊花更容易应对不通的成长条件。

sent.orig: Being extreme uncomfortable in mum's arms car sickness, I feel mum's arms so helpless.
sent.trans: 在妈妈怀里晕车晕得不行，我觉得母亲的手此时如此无力。

sent.orig: One day he came running home shouting: "Mum, Mum, look at me!"
sent.trans: 一天他跑回家大喊大叫“妈咪，妈咪，快看我呀”

sent.orig: She is my mum. She is my mum.
sent.trans: 她是我妈妈。她是我妈妈。

sent.orig: The garden mum is better able to handle different growing conditions than the florist mum.
sent.trans: 花园菊花比花店菊花更能够适应不同的生长环境。
